ygData.subject: novice questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I just bought EQ (my friends talked me into it) and they wanted me to play a Cleric - which fortunately is what I always play anyway because I like them.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I just bought EQ (my friends talked me into it)
and they wanted me to play a Cleric - which fortunately
is what I always play anyway because I like them. I read
through some of the archives here, and I have a few
questions:

What is the best race for the cleric? I made a high-elf.
Are they good? It seemed to have the highest wisdom.

It looks like strength is really important? What is a
good minimum strength.

thanks for the help.
